name: Nyctophobia (itch) (GAMEINC20)
description:
Evaluation Link: https://forms.gle/dX6W9RLs5jZAFZKZ9

A story about Eddy being left alone and exploring the dark mysterious parallel universe. Everything was strange and scary. After finding himself stuck in the strange world with 'terrifying monsters', he tried his best but he cannot do it alone. He needs your help !

Nyctophobia, fear of darkness. We need your help to guide our boy, Eddy maintains his sanity to fight the enemy and find ways to fulfil his dream of getting out of the game. So be brave and help Eddy!  Give it a try and win this game. You are our only hope to free Eddy!
